sen.j: 新田 革左衛門（にった かくざえもん、生年不詳 - 元治元年7月22日 (旧暦)（1864年8月23日）頃）は、新選組平隊士。
sen.e: Kakuzaemon NITTA (date of birth unknown-August 23, 1864) was a member of the Shinsengumi.

sen.j: 名は新井田仁左衛門、新田角右衛門とも。
sen.e: He was also called by other names such as Nizaemon NIIDA or Kakuemon NITTA.

sen.j: 文久三年秋以降、元治元年前半までに入隊。
sen.e: He became a member of the Shinsengumi at some time between the fall of 1863 and the first half of 1864.

sen.j: 元治元年六月五日、池田屋事件の際は、近藤隊に所属。
sen.e: By the time when the Ikedaya Incident occurred on July 8, 1864, he was already a member belonging to KONDO's squad in the Shinsengumi.
